meanings.definition: Having the stress or accent on the final syllable.
meanings.sent1: The oxytone word sounded strange to my ears.
meanings.sent2: She pointed out the oxytone nature of the word.
meanings.sent3: The oxytone emphasis made the word seem like it was whispering.
meanings.sent4: The oxytone stress lingered in the air like a soft melody.
meanings.sent5: The oxytone pronunciation made the word stand out in the sentence.

meanings.definition: A word or phrase with the stress or accent on the final syllable.
meanings.sent1: I struggled to remember the meaning of the oxytone.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the concept of an oxytone in class.
meanings.sent3: The oxytone in the sentence made it sound like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: Her name was an oxytone that echoed in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The oxytone at the end of the word gave it a unique rhythm.
